scripts.pub@dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_ENV=pub yarn workspace bundler webpack --mode=development --config webpack.config.mjs
scripts.pub@prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BUILD_ENV=pub yarn workspace bundler webpack --mode=production --config webpack.config.mjs
scripts.pub@serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_ENV=pub SERVE_MODE=true yarn workspace bundler webpack serve --mode=development --config webpack.config.mjs
scripts.src@dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_ENV=src yarn workspace bundler webpack --mode=development --config webpack.config.mjs
scripts.src@prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BUILD_ENV=src yarn workspace bundler webpack --mode=production --config webpack.config.mjs
scripts.src@serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_ENV=src SERVE_MODE=true yarn workspace bundler webpack serve --mode=development --config webpack.config.mjs
